inn1.comm: good start, starts around leg, moves away, the batsman reads the angle well and lets it go
this time it's even straighter, makes him play, uppishly back to the bowler
plays with soft hands towards mid-on, and rushes through for one
starts off outside off, goes away with the angle, Kayes shoulders arms
nice shot, gently flicked past midwicket, but the timing is really good, it was a length ball on the pads
starts off with a length ball outside off, left alone
uppishly driven, clears point, smart shot actually, doesn't go all out, just makes sure he clears the infield, with an open face
short ball, looks to duck, then changes his mind at the last moment, and pulls unconvincingly, he is safe though
hangs his bat outside off, is beaten by the slight away movement
goes for the big shot through the covers, goes too hard at it, gets the inside half of the bat, towards mid-on
this time he gets onto the front foot and defends, soft hands
back of a length, angled across him, defended off the front foot
and he bowls short and wide, and although Kayes is on the front foot he cuts - rolling his wrists over it, all along the ground and wide of cover
gets fuller and straighter this time, defended back to the bowler
stays back, defends towards mid-off
comes forward, the ball is slightly shorter than he likes, and he defends

dropped, rather neither keeper nor slip goes for it! Reminiscent of Sehwag and the Tests last month. This is edged hard, between Sanga and Jayawardene, Sanga looks to go for it, then pulls out, and Jayawardene hasn't moved
nice shot, salt meets wound, length ball, and it's lofted nonchalantly over covers
pulls the length back, and meets a defensive shot off the back foot
flicked off the hips, wide of square leg, comes back for two, despite brushing Thushara on the way back and losing his bat, but not for a mili second does he wait
that's an ugly swish, every now and then he does that, and misses the edge by feet at least
stays back, defends towards short cover
that's a biggie, Thushara tries the bouncer, Tamim's weight is forward but he goes ahead with the hook, gets elevation and gets it over the square-leg boundary, six rows back, swivel-hook it was
angled across Kayes, he shoulders arms
length ball, angling across, gets on the front foot and defends
starts just outside off, Kayes covers his stumps and lets it go
slashes and misses, back of a length, slight width, goes for it and is nowhere near it
slower ball, full, outside off, left alone, bounces twice on the way to Sanga
another play and miss, and it's a maiden, a rare commodity these days, the ball stayed low a touch
width outside off, played with an open face, gets a single to third man
extra bounce here, from back of a length, but it's way outside off to make him play
backward point, cover-point, short point, all are there, and he finds a way through them! Lesson of the ball: don't ball short and wide to Kayes
strays onto the pads, and is flicked wide of mid-on, gets a couple
looks to run it down to third man, is early into the shot, plays it more towards point
the arm drops early in the stride, and he bowls a Test wide, two bounces to Sanga also
wild slog, hands on heads, but it goes safely through midwicket
punched off the back foot, with an open face, gets a single to third man
looks to cut, but it's too close to his body, handcuffs him as he goes for the shot, lucky he doesn't get an edge
driven on the up, and this is no driving length, he sees mid-off is fairly wide and goes ahead with the shot, big stride and not looking to hit too hard, just wanting to go straight
goes for the cover-drive this time, doesn't get the timing, plays towards cover
and he pushes a length ball towards long-on for one
back of a length, angled across him, he shoulders arms
starts with an accurate delivery, defended off the front foot
fuller, airier this time, Tamim defends watchfully
this is flatter, pushed off the back foot, towards midwicket

premeditated sweep, from in front of the stumps, the ball straightens, Tamim misses, Randiv goes up for a spontaneous appeal, middle and leg stumps visible, Taufel upholds it, and spin has struck in the first over
big lbw shout first up, starts just outside off, turns in sharply, beats the bat, but Ashraful is saved because of too much turn
flighted outside off, defended to cover, wicket-maiden, what start
aggression there, good bouncer, tailing him, pulls out in time
this short one doesn't get up much, and he pulls it down into the ground and gets two to midwicket
back of a length, turned away to midwicket
fuller delivery, starts outside off, is left alone
punched away off the back foot, but finds short point
gets onto the front foot, meets the ball with soft hands, and pinches a single to mid-off
looks for a sharp single to midwicket, but he hasn't created much distance between the shot and the fielder
swept, quite similarly to how Tamim did, but he connects
flighted, around middle, turning in, defended to leg
draws him outside off, defended back to the bowler
lovely shot, slight risk involved in playing against the spin, but he gets close to the pitch, covers the spin, goes inside-out, all along the ground
gets straighter this time, Ashraful comes forward and defends to leg
looks to run it down to third man, can't beat point
nice shot, he knew there was no slip, waited an extra second on it, and then opened the face at the last moment, the third man is too square
length ball, gets on the front foot, defends to cover
yorker, digs it out with an open face
back of a length, not much room, defended towards cover
bouncer, gets good bounce, shoulder high, decides against hooking
starts off with a short and wide delivery, cut away with soft hands, gets two to wide of third man
driven hard, good-looking shot, but sweeper-cover is in place
back of a length, just outside off, Kayes covers the off stump, and lets the ball go through
stays low a touch, but he does well to place it square of third man and comes back for two, it's a tight second run but Kulasekara's throw is wide
another pulled six, it's a chest-high bouncer, gets under it, swivels back as he pulls, goes behind the stumps and deep square leg has no chance of getting around
slower ball, beats a prod outside off
Randiv saves four at backward point, full driven, full-blooded drive, but Randiv dies full length
back of a length now, defended towards cover
another lovely cover drive from Ashraful, perfect drivable length, gets the stride in, opens the face a touch and gets it wide enough of mid-off
again he goes back to short of length, and is defended towards cover
runs this one down to third man for a single
bouncer, outside off, sways out comfortably

two days in a row an ambitious second run has claimed a Bangladeshi wicket! and what a ripper of a throw from Thushara from third man! Ashraful opens the face and gets it wide of second slip, Thushara is pretty square and has to run around, Ashraful decides to come back, and Thushara hits the stumps direct on a half-volley, finding his diving bat past the line but in the air
the ball stays low again, left alone by Raqibul but it dies on Sanga
full delivery, driven to sweeper-cover for a single
lbw appeal, angling across, not straightening enough, it's given a run strangely
full, driven down to mid-on, straight to the fielder
Thirimanne dives at sweeper-cover and fumbles, it was driven on the up, the boundary was saved but they got the extra run
short ball, gets big on him, played wristily off the back foot, keeps it down
another short ball, he stands tall, gets on the top of the bounce and turns it around the corner for one
pushed down to mid-off, straight and forcefully, so no single
goes for the expansive drive, gets an inside edge that misses the leg stump by inches
short ball, doesn't get up much, but he ducks under it successfully
this time he doesn't duck, and the short ball chases him as he sways out of the way, dropping the wrists, and he is safe
but mid-on is still up, and keeps this down to a dot
short, outside off, runs it down to third man
a rare length ball, flicked off the pads, gets a single
beats him outside off as he looks for that easy single down to third man
into the pads, worked away into the leg side for one
looks for a single to leg side, turns the bat face too early, but the ball is angling across the off stump
nicely cut away, to sweeper-cover for one
short delivery again, gets good bouncer, gets tall, and rolls his wrists on it, dropping it right down at his feet
the plan almost works, another short delivery, he goes for the big pull, two men waiting in the deep, but gets the toe end of the bat and gets a single towards third man
dropped, sitter, at short cover, knee high, uppishly driven, not much power into it, and Jayawardene is late in reacting, letting it go out of his hands
defended towards cover
driven wide of mid-on, gets himself a single
stops at him, he goes for the hard straight drive, and it lobs past the bowler
dabs this one down for a single to third man
back of a length, defended with an open face
length ball on the pads, flicked away to fine leg

poor shot, asking for trouble, getting the front foot across and playing across the line, it's a straight delivery, bowled from close to the stumps, and Taufel has no hesitation in lifting his finger - he came too far across here
back of a length, just outside off, he lets that one go through
short, across him, pushed to sweeper-cover for one
another bouncer, Shakib lets it go, too high it is
slightly fuller this time, defended back to the bowler
driven on the up, but straight towards mid-off
too wide outside off
full ball this time, defended watchfully
this is a half-volley, and eased through the cover field, gets two to wide of sweeper-cover
pulls the length back, doesn't let him drive, pushed to cover
and it comes into play, driven one bounce to silly mid-on
back of a length, defended with soft hands, towards cover
good bouncer, chest high, shapes to pull, but pulls out
jags back off the seam, beats the flick, there is an lbw shout, but maybe doing too much
goes for the cut, gets a thick outside edge, is safe
angling across him, pushed towards cover
drags this one short, cut away to sweeper-cover
tossed up, goes straight with the angle, defended to cover
nicely flighted again, driven down the ground for one
kick, turn and bounce, from a full, driving length, beats the drive, and bounces nearly rib-high for Sanga
paddle-scoop, cheeky shot, it helps that the ball is on the leg stump and is flat
looks to cut, but this is neither the length nor the width to do so
driven on the up, but back to the bowler, who does well in his followthrough
back of a length this time, pushed to mid-off
this is slightly too full and drive, eased through to wide of sweeper-cover for two
on the pads, and helped away for an easy single
pushed down to mid-off, no run
looks for the cut, and is beaten by the lack of bounce
nicely tossed, pushed towards midwicket
good flight, good length, not too close to him, he has to stretch to defend
turn this time, but starts too straight and gives away wides
short this time, rocks back and cuts away for a single
that was dangerous, going deep into the crease to a fullish legbreak, got his bat down just in time
looking for the cover drive, and finding the cover fieldsman
another flatter delivery pushing him back, again he is hurried, again he gets his bat down in time
bouncer, called a wide, has to be marginal, slightly over the head
fuller now, looks to run it down to third man, finds point
back of a length, slightly outside off, no room, defended back
again back of a length and slightly outside off, this time he waits for it and opens his face, and gets a single
slower offcutter, 100ks, cutting away to just outside off, defended to cover
this is usual pace, on the stumps, driven to mid-off
another slower ball, this time Shakib opens the face of the bat and rushes through for single to cover
flighted delivery, driven down the ground, gets a single
goes back, cuts a shortish delivery to sweeper-cover
looks for the paddle again, he bowls it short, Shakib gets it past square leg somehow
slightly fuller, Raqib still wants to cut, and is beaten by the turn
fuller still, just outside off, brings him onto the front foot, defended
stays back to a similar length delivery and works it past point
turn there, but too short, and is worked away on the on side
stays back and defends a topspinner
fuller ball, turning away, defends towards cover
gets a thick edge this time, drawing him forward, turning it away, but it doesn't carry to point
strays onto the pads now, and is worked away to fine leg
some dip on it, but it's turning into the pads and goes for one to fine leg
overpitched, driven down the ground
powerfully swept, all along the ground, gets a single to square leg
again looks to cut a delivery too full, is beaten by the turn and the bounce
the getaway shot, the sweep, in front of square, powerful, all along the carpet, and beats deep midwicket
nudged away to one side for one - nobody inside the circle there
overpitched, driven down to long-off, gets one
drops it a bit short and he gets back and cuts to point and pushes the single
waits for the turn and clips him down to midwicket
clips him to midwicket and there's a misfield but they don't take the run
pushed just wide of midwicket
goes back, waits for the turn and works it wide of square leg
gets forward to cover the turn and turns it to midwicket
goes deep into the crease and works this towards fine leg
stretches forward and nudges it for one to cover
goes for sweep from wide outside off, hits himself in the pad
looks to nudge him from outside off, it turns and gets an inside edge onto the pad
again beaten on a cut to a ball too full
flatter this time, pushed back to him
stretches forward, opens the face, plays it straight towards short third
goes for the Dlishan-like scoop, gets Sanga in the chest, Sanga covers his face with the gloves as he can't get out of the line. Immediately he asks for the helmet
driven down the ground this time
big shout for lbw on a sweep, Taufel waits and waits and says not out, it just got the glove on its way through, so good call
defended off the front foot
steps out of the crease, and pushes it back to the bowler
looks to cut a ball too full, almost chops it on
steps out again, pushed back to the bowler
defended back to the bowler again
this is flat and cuttable, and cut he does, square of sweeper-cover, gets two
another sweep, this is safe, and gets him one
nicely flighted, defended to cover
bowls flat, and is cut away for a single
another scoop, this time he clears Sanga, right in the V behind the stumps
turning into the pads, turned away to short fine
good drift there, as he gets forward and defends
straighter one, pitches middle and goes straight, almost a leading edge
full ball, can't get power into the drive, back to the bowler
pitches leg, goes with the angle, worked away for one
turn and bounce, and beats an attempt at drive
flatter this time, pushed to sweeper-cover for one
full, driven past the bowler, to long-on
rare rank short delivery, and is cut away towards sweeper-cover
driven past Randiv, who dives but can't prevent a single
overpitched, on the pads, is driven down the ground
turning into the pads, looks to turn it short fine, but is beaten
overpitched, on the pads, worked away to square leg

Shakib goes for the scoop now, gets the front foot across, and lofts it over Sanga's head, Thirimanne makes an ordinary effort running from fine leg, overrunning the ball and letting it slip under his hand
swept in front of square this time, will be just a single
steps out of the crease and drives him down to long-off
shout for lbw, flatter delivery, but no spin on it and it's angling down the leg side, all three stumps visible
gets onto the front foot and defends
good shot, chipped over the infield, inside out
goes back into the crease and forces a shortish delivery down the ground
jumps out of the crease again, but his drive can't beat cover
short ball, slightly outside off, helped away to third man
slower ball down the leg side, just brushes the pad on the way
looks for the cut, too close to him, chops it into the ground, it bounces over a leaping Sanga
fuller this time, no room either, played back to the bowler
slower off cutter, pushed down the ground one
good short delivery, not much room, and he sways out of its line
goes for the big shout, drags it from outside off and goes one bounce to wide long-on
gets on the front foot and pushes a wide delivery to sweeper-cover
google, doesn't turn much, played towards cover
gets onto the front foot, and drives it to long-on
pulls the length down this time, and is worked away for an easy single in the off side
Shakib steps out again, Bandara goes slower and airier, he is beaten in the flight and is forced to defend back to the bowler
length ball, wide, looks like a four-ball, slapped away powerfully, and straight to Randiv at point, life's like that, and Bangladesh are four down
full, outside off, left alone
comes forward, opens the face on a length ball, towards point
looks to tuck him up with a short one, doesn't get high enough, is worked away for one to square leg
back of a length, pushed away to mid-off
driveable length, he does drive, but one bounce back to the bowler, good over for Sri Lanka, a run and a wicket
flat delivery into the pads, worked away for one
gets forward, opens the face of the bat, gets a single to point
nicely tossed up, Mushfiq comes forward, defends back to the bowler
topspinner, hurries him up as he looks to turn it to leg, ends up playing straight back to the bowler
dances down the track, drives him down the ground for one
wrong'un, again not much turn, Shakib gets deep into the crease and cuts him towards sweeper-cover
swipes a length delivery over square leg, gets a couple
bouncer, pulled away towards fine leg
looks to clear mid-on, who is in circle, mis-hits, gets too much under it, but still manages to clear the fielder
dabs this one down to third man
another short delivery, pulled convincingly but can't find the gap in the deep
looks to run it down to third man again, but hits straight towards point
full delivery outside off, driven down the ground for one
shot, big shot, goes with the turn, over midwicket, clean hit, fielders as witnesses
goes leg side again, doesn't get enough bat into it, just a single to long-on
flat delivery, pushed down to long-off
flighted full, driven straight down the ground, between long-off and long-on, enough time to come back for two
good shot, goood shot, into the stands this time, slog-sweeps, from outside off, makes crisp connection, and gees over midwicket
short into the body, pulled to fine leg
flighted generously, worked from outside off to square leg
pushed past over, uppishly, but gets a single
topspinner, gets a leading edge as he looks on side, but it bounces just in front of him
goes for the big sweep from outside off, kicks off the back of his bat into Sanga's chest
dances down the track, and gets a single to long-off
and he is out first ball of the Powerplay, he walks into the trap, short ball, drags from outside off for the pull, gets under it and is caught nicely at the square-leg boundary
shapes up for the shot over midwicket, gets a full and wide yorker, digs it out for a single to cover
goes for another wide yorker, too wide this time
this is a better yorker, close to off, can't do anything with it
walks across the stumps, and sweeps the fast bowler, a slower ball from in front of his stumps and gets four to fine of fine leg
that's a crunchy shot, the yorker misses, he makes it into a low fulltoss, gets under it, and goes over the on side, Mushfiq is on fire
gets the yorker right this time, gets a dot ball
turning into the pads, worked away for one to fine leg

superb bowling in a Powwerplay, still keeping it slow, and beating a dancing-down Mushfiq in flight, and because he is not close to the pitch of the ball he gets under it and the mid-off doesn't have too far back to run to catch this
turned away off the pads for one
turning into the pads, and he works it to square leg for one
smart shot, backs away early, makes him fire down the leg side, moves back to the stumps and sweeps him square of short fine leg
flighted towards the pads, and worked away to short fine
starts off with a length, ball, hit well, but back to the bowler
another length ball, can't get under it, though, not looking to take risks just as yet, driven straight to cover
goes for the big, clumsy swipe this time, gets a big chunky inside edge on a slower delivery, and gets four because fine leg is square
bowled him, yorker, on off stump, not many can get adventurous with it, he tries to run it down to third man and is beaten
inside edge while looking to dab it to third man, gets a single to fine leg

misses out on a leg-side freebie with fine leg up, and the bowler misses out on a run-out. He flicked the fulltoss straight to short fine and didn't run right away, and while he could have been run out Kula got a big bounce on the throw and couldn't collect cleanly
flighted on the stumps, extra bounce there as he looks to work it behind square on the on side
looks for the scoop over Sanga's head, and is beaten by the extra bounce and is hit in the shoulder

fourth wicket in the fourth over of Powerplays, he looks to work it past short fine, the ball sneaks under a diving Thirimanne and they run. Razzak wants the third, which is not on, especially when Kula's throw is right on the top of stumps and Sanga is quick in whipping the bails off
topspinner, looks to turn it to leg, gets the outside half of the bat as it doesn't turn
flighted around middle, played towards middle
looks to push a topspinner down the ground, is hurried by the pace and ends up playing back to Randiv, whose 10 over shave gone for 2 for 40, well bowled
yorker misses the direction and is a wide down the leg side
slower ball, no room, and he is caught not knowing what to do with it, and defends
low fulltoss on the pads, flicked to wide of long-on
full delivery, driven powerfully, can't get through extra cover, though
that's five wickets in Powerplays, Kula bowls a bouncer, Rubel goes for the pull, gets afaint tickle on the way through to Kula
full delivery, played with an open face towards point
sharp bouncer, he lets it go
length ball, defended to cover, Mahumdullah looking to bat 50 overs?
almost plays it on, but gets it fine of fine leg and more importantly comes back for two and retains strike
this bouncer goes too high and is duly signalled wide
full delivery, just short of being a yorker, can't do much with it
length ball, driven inside-out, gets a isngle to sweeper-cover, two balls for Rasel to survive
takes a single fifth ball, now Mahmud will need to take another
that's better than a single, it's a poor fulltoss down the leg side, asking to be tickled for four, and Mahmudullah obliges
slashes and misses outside off, the ball dies on Sanga
length ball, again goes for the big shot, and is beaten, not looking for the single, surprising
that's why he wasn't looking for a single, gets under a short ball, and cuts it over point, keeping the bounce under control throughout
back of a length, pushed straight to cover
big swipe outside off, misses, and it is a marginal wide
crashed through the off side, length ball, driven with an open face, gets just a single
yorker goes slightly awry, chipped away towards midwicket, keeps strike for the final over
slower ball, beats the big swish outside off
yorker, played back to the bowler, two very good deliveries
slower ball again, hit powerfully down the ground, turns down the single
doesn't time this attempted big hit over the on side, gets just a single to long-on
swinging yorker, misses the off stump by inches
flicked away to midwicket, gets just a single

inn2.comm: hint of swing, defended to cover, another surprise - the keeper is not up for Rasel
some swing there, starts around leg, and ends middle, pushed back to the bowler
keeps bowling in the channel, defended around off
back of a length this time, pushed to cover
pitches it up again, hint of swing again, and driven down to mid-off
poor delivery on the pads to ruin a steady over, strays on the pads, gentle pace, and is easily glanced away to the fine-leg boundary
easy delivery to let him get off the mark, gentle loosener on the pads, and Mahela can flick them past square leg all night
back of a length, tucking him up around off, defended to cover
lovely shot, as good as we have seen today, driven on the up, through cover, lovely balance, little power, all timing
straight half-volley, driven well again, but straight towards mid-on
another boundary, classy square cut, short, not too wide, he gets on top the of the bounce and cuts past point
on the pads, and flicked away past midwicket, he is running away with this, and will keep strike too
back of a length, no room, defended to leg
length ball across Mahela, he drops it to cover and runs
another gift down the pads, and he glances it past short fine again
short this time, punched away wide of point, will get one
back on target, not much room, just short of a length, defended
slightly more room this time and he runs it off the face of his bat for a single
flighted, around leg stump, and flicked away for a single
on the stumps, not much turn, defended to cover
flat, into the pads, played towards mid-on
looks to work it down the leg side but is beaten by the angle
slower, higher, shorter, defended back to the bowler
another flighted delivery, this one he pushes to long-off for one
he overpitches first ball, and is driven inside-out, through the covers, lovely shot
edged past slip, this one skid on to him as he looked to cut it, the thick edge went way wide of first slip
flighted at the stumps, defended to on
some turn into the left-hander as he looks to cut and is cramped
arm ball, skidder too, stays a touch low, and Tharanga drops the idea of playing a forceful shot and defends
fired into his pads, misses out on making contact
tossed up around off, played back to the bowler
well played by Mahela, well fielded by Rubel, Mahela is beaten in the flight as he jumps out of the crease but still manages to chip it over mid-off, and Rubel gives a good chase, dives and saves two
flat, into the pads, gets a single to deep midwicket
tossed up generously, Tharanga gets to the pitch of the ball and drives, the turn takes it squarer than he intends but he is in control of the shot, it goes all along the ground
now he over compensates and bowls a wide down the leg side
slightly short of driving length, so he pushes it down the ground, with soft hands
flighted on the pads, bunted to wide of mid-on and steals a single
full delivery, Mahela almost yorks himself, plays it back to Shakib
this time he drives down the ground, can't beat mid-off
slows it down, around the leg line, and defended to midwicket
looks to drive a full delivery, plays it back to Shakib
drags this one short, misses out on a four-ball, finds deep square leg, gets only one
steps out, is looking for the big hit, aborts the plan, just pushes to wide of mid-off and takes a single
short, wide, Tharanga rocks back, cuts, finds the gap, bread and butter
this time he gives it more flight, is straighter, and Tharanga defends back to the bowler
slight width and he goes for the drive, but can't beat cover this time
the moment he blows flat he is punished again, Tharanga stands tall and slaps it away through the cover ring
overpitched, driven towards short cover
on the pads, flicks it away, retains strike
on the pads, worked away for a single to deep midwicket
classy shot, dances down the track and even though not to the pitch of it, he lofts it over mid-on, good extension of arms, good balance
this time shows him the full face of the bat and defends
fired into the pads, worked away to fine leg for one
flat, fired in across Tharanga, skids and stays low, else this would be four too
punched away, towards cover, won't get a single
and starts off poorly again, into the pads again, and flicked away past mid-on comfortably, Naeem has to sprint as if in a 100m race to stop this from going to the boundary
angled across him and he helps himself to a single to third man
driven on the up, a length delivery, can't beat mid-off
short, not enough width and skids through too, beating Mahela's attempt at a cut

big shout for lbw, Taufel reckons it's going down, it moves in a bit upon pitching, beating the bat, and also slipping down the leg side. Hawkeye says it would have brushed the leg stump, but Taufel couldn't have been sure
overpitched, drilled down the ground, mid-off has to dive to keep them to one
good shot, gooood shot, this is not too short nor wide, he takes it from in front of off and squeezes it between backward point and cover-point
fuller this time, defended to leg
fired down the leg side, too far down
even bigger this wide is
gets better in line but is worked away for one to fine leg
flat just outside off, he opens the face and gets a single
into the pads, and is worked away to square leg for one
slower, turning into the pads, skids too and beats him
length ball on the pads, flicked away to deep square leg
looking to tuck him, is worked away for easy single to square leg
looks to cut, and is beaten by the ball that says low
back of a length, rising towards the ribs, played down towards midwicket
almost played on, Mahela looking to manufacture the inside-out shot, playing away from his body, the pads save him
no matter if you have beaten him last ball, don't give Mahela length balls on the pads, flicked away, deliberately in font of square to beat the deep fielder
wide and full, he will feel he has missed out on the square drive as he ends up playing inside the line
full delivery, on the pads, driven down the ground
defended off the front foot
comes forward and defends again
flatter delivery, and he cuts, doesn't quite get it right, and can't get past point
and he slows it up again, and draws another defensive shot from Mahela
starts off with an offbreak, full, and is driven down the ground for one
full again, driven inside-out, gets a single to sweeper-cover
slightly back of a length, pushed to cover
fuller this time, and is driven down the ground for one
nicely flighted, and he defends back to the bowler
presses forward and defended to cover
full delivery, driven with an open face, gets one square
wide, way down the leg side
this is cut from in front of the stumps and through the cover field, stifled ooh and aahs as it seemed he might play it on
driven down the ground, gets a single
short and wide, cut away to sweeper-cover
pushed away towards cover for one
angled into the pads, played towards square leg, gets another single
flicked away off the pads, gets another single
looks to push to long-off, there is no spin on the ball and hence gets the inside half of the bat towards long-on
slow slow delivery, around middle and leg, pushed down to long-on
another single, to sweeper-cover this time
flatter delivery, played towards midwicket
presses forward, defends a flighted delivery towards cover
short, into the pads, looks for single, can't get past midwicket
short and wide, pushed to sweeper-cover for one
fifty for Mahela, 100 for Sri Lanka, it's a poor delivery, glanced off the pads to fine of fine leg where Rubel runs around and makes a good effort to save one run
back of a length, played with an open face, just right of cover, and takes a single
fuller, across him, driven, can't beat extra cover
back of a length, no room, played back to the bowler
short and wide, and he has threaded it through backward point and short third man, that's his fifty too
fuller now, pushed back towards the bowler
whips a leg-side delivery, can't beat short midwicket
nicely flighted, no pace on the ball, is defended back to him
this time he makes room and cuts it to sweeper-cover
flatter delivery, looks to dab it, can't connect properly
pushed to cover
driven one bounce to cover
back of a length, hit through the covers, gets one
slower ball, does right to field it to his right
looks to late cut, gets the bottom part of the bat
another slower delivery, tucked away for one
comes out of the crease, plays a chip shot over midwicket, Naeem runs around from wide long-on and keeps them down to one
tossed op, on the pads, pushed down the ground for one
shorter, cut away to sweeper-cover
drives with an open face, can't get it past extra cover
this time he goes straighter with the shot, gets a single
another single for Mahela, down to long-on
back of a length, pulled away to midwicket for one
back of a length, dabbed to point
punched away with an open face, finds point
fuller delivery, can't get the drive past cover
edged past the keeper, is pushing at it in front of his body but edges it past Mushfiq
offcutter, stays low too, does well to get his bat down in time
nice shot, killing him softly, takes it virtually of the keeper's gloves, leaning back to make room, and gets it past short third
fuller delivery, played back to the bowler
makes room for himself and cuts it between the points, backward and cover, lovely shot
drives down the ground, gets another single
flighted, driven back to the bowler
that's the first risky shot of the night, goes across and sweeps in the air, is lucky he has gone left enough of Tamim who is running from deep midwicket
back of a length, pushed to cover
short and wide, cut away, gets four, that's not where you bowl to Tharanga at 110ks
beautiful, straight drive, on the up, no power, just meets the ball, no followthrough either, and bisects mid-off and mid-on
driven with an open face this time, gets a single to sweeper-cover
leg-side fulltoss, doesn't time it well, gets a single one bounce to deep square leg
another lovely shot, full and wide, and he drives with an open face, fine of point, square of third man
back of a length, outside off, pushed to cover
that's a good old kitchen sink, un-Mahela, he clears the front leg and drills it down the ground, mid-off does well
slower ball, runs it down to third man for a single
short and wide, misses out on the cut shot there, angle takes the ball away
slower ball, full, outside off, helped away to third man
short, into the pads, and pulled away, all too easy
bowls full outside off, is driven away for a single
short, on the stumps, makes room and forces it through the covers
slower, fuller, defended with an open face
beautiful cover-drive, flighted generously, too close to his body and he drives it through covers with an open face, getting it wide of sweeper-cover
goes back to bowling flat, defended back to him
driven with an open face again, gets a single to sweeper-cover
back of a length, played with an open face, towards point
dabs this one down to third man for a single
short again, Mahela pulls again, hurries onto him, but he still gets it past mid-on and gets a couple
on target this time, no room, dot ball
full ball, driven well, but can't beat extra cover
short, cramps him up, but he gets a sharp single to point
looks for the big sweep, opening up his front leg, doesn't make proper connection, yet gets a single
tossed up, gets a bit of dip, Tharanga hits it back towards the bowler
another delivery nicely flighted, not the driving length, played with an open face towards short third
angling into the pads, worked away for one
full, into the pads, easy single down to long-on
flatter delivery, pushed towards extra cover, Mahmud dives, but fumbles, gives away a single
tucks him up with a shortish delivery, played towards midwicket
full and wide this time, gets a single to sweeper-cover
short delivery again, he pulls, not convincingly
this bouncer gets big on him, he is not in control of the shot at all, but it lands one bounce to fine leg
that's well bowled, a rare play and miss, lands around off, moves away, beats the defensive poke
back of a length, around off, defended towards point
angled into the pads, nudged away towards fine leg
worked off the pads again
overpitched, driven down the ground for one
that's slightly short, and the cut shot is so good that Rubel at short third has to dive full length to keep them to one
flighted on the pads, cant beat midwicket
goes straighter with the push-drive, gets a single to long-on
Mahela clears his front leg and lofts him over mid-on, length ball, could get under it and just hit through the line
an effort ball, short, Mahela looking to upper-cut it, and he is slow on it
high, high bouncer, easy call for a wide

nothing is going right for Bangladesh, Mahela looks to loft it over the leg side, gets the back of the bat, and it lobs to land safely between three fielders on the off side: point, third man, and sweeper-cover
dabs it down to square of third man and comes back for two
fuller, and pushed away with an open face
length ball, pushed wide of mid-off, gets a single
looks to late-cut, can't beat point
gets onto the front foot, and pushes it to long-off for one
drives, drives well, one bounce to cover
slows it down this time, Tharanga presses forward and defends
worked away off the pads, gets a single
wide, pushed down the leg side
on the pads, gets a leg-bye
short, pulled away, gets a single to deep square leg, all long the ground
fuller, driven, Naeem Islam makes a diving save at point
short to Mahela again, and he is pulled over midwicket this time, quick transfer of weight and good placement
this is an even better pull, too predictable the short ball and he goes to the same spot, overtakes Tharanga in the race to the century
full delivery now, on the pads, clipped away for one
drives a fullish delivery, can't get past extra cover
presses forward, and defends back to the bowler
defended to cover again
looks for a drive, doesn't get it right
angled into the pads, can't get it past midwicket
flatter, outside off, pushed to mid-off
maiden over, looks to turn it to leg, bat turns too early, but he is safe
Naeem brought back, short, and cut away forward of square
angled into the pads, pushed to midwicket
watchfully defended
and again defended back to the bowler, no hurry to get to 100
spoke too early, he plays the scoop shot on 97! but the fine leg is deep and perhaps he know it
full, pushed down the ground, retains strike
flat, around off, defended
dropped, loud edge, thick edge, big deviation also, too difficult to catch
fired outside leg, misses
on the front foot, defends it back to the bowler
flights it up again, and he defends it to leg
almost creates a gate between bat and pad, slight turn, not much, both batsmen edgy close to their hundreds
flighted, on the pads, defended to leg
leading edge towards point, looking to turn it to leg
looks for the cut, it's too close to him, chops it into the ground
again defends a straight delivery watchfully
there it is, it has taken time coming, and he makes room and cuts a short delivery from in front of the stumps, between cover-point and backward-point, more of relief on his face
works it off his pads, gets a single
presses forward, shows it the full face in a forward-defensive
arm ball, makes room, but the ball follows him
pushed down the ground for one
defended off the front foot
flat on the pads, turned to midwicket
looks to cramp him on the leg stump, but goes too far down the leg side
drops it to cover, with soft hands, and pinches a single
moves onto 99, soft hands again, and Mahela calls him through as it has gone to the right of short third
full delivery, defended back to the bowler
now he opens up, dances down the track and lofts him over midwicket
looks to work it on the on side, sees the ball is the straighter one and defends it back to the bowler
beautifully bowled, quicker and straighter one, it's the toppie that takes a fine edge, and Mushfiq takes a good catch, Mahela walks
and he is jumping out of the crease first ball, beaten in the flight, but goes ahead with the shot and gets it wide enough of midwicket
flat, angled across him, can't get it past point
flighted, around leg, pushed to midwicket
defends another flighted delivery
flat on the pads, defended, eight men inside the circle
that's 100 for Tharanga, short, wide, and how fitting he should get there with the cut, off comes the helmet, arms aloft
presses forward and defends, will he quicken this chase up now?
into the pads, worked to wide of deep square leg
dances down the track and chips him over mid-on, never looking to hit him too hard
flatter delivery, pushes it down to mid-off
steps out of the crease and works it to square leg for one
short, fired into the pads, hoisted over square leg
another halftracker, and easily pulled up and over
pushes a flat delivery to midwicket
can't force this one through the cover field
and again hit straight towards midwicket
just to torture us, he pulls out the textbook forward defensive
another copy-book push-drive back to the bowler
just so that it's not a maiden, dances down the track, makes room as he does so, and lofts him over extra cover
moves forward, defends back to the bowler
makes room, can't get past extra cover
angled into the pads, strolls through for a single
short, pulled away, a single to deep midwicket
full delivery on the pads, driven down the ground for one
full, pitching outside leg, and swept fine, gets four more
offbreak, around leg, bunted for a single
another stroll for a single
wide down the leg side, Bangladesh helping SL out in hurrying up
pushed wide of Tamim, doesn't take the risky single, wants to see the asterisk next to his name, and why not?
pushed to midwicket, another dot
there's the win, and fittingly through a cut through covers from Tharanga
